    • Uses of ChangePlanItemStateBuilder in org.flowable.cmmn.api

      Methods in org.flowable.cmmn.api that return ChangePlanItemStateBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ChangePlanItemStateBuilder CmmnRuntimeService.createChangePlanItemStateBuilder()
      Create a ChangePlanItemStateBuilder, that allows to set various options for changing the state of a process instance.
